titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4965) to prohibit the procedure commonly known as partial-birth abortion.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-608, by Mrs. Myrick.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 201.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 498.
DEBATE - The House continued with debate on H. Res. 498.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 248 - 177 (Roll no. 340).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/23/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 4965 (prohibiting partial-birth abortions).
